isis.stitle: CAB: 4100, 4200, 4300 AND 4400 MODELS - INSTALL - EXTENDED CAB BUNK/STORAGE UNIT

svcsubproc.title: Install Bunk/Storage Unit on Extended Cab for all Models
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 100
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Slide driver side seat all the way forward to allow installation of bunk/storage unit (Item 4) into the cab.
Turn bunk/storage unit on it's side and install into cab through passenger side door opening. Position bunk/storage unit (Item 4) over the four threaded studs in cab floor.
Position seat belts (Item 7) over mounting holes in rear floor mat (Item 8) and cab floor and install torx head bolts (Item 6). Tighten to 25 to 35 lbf-ft (34 to 47.5 N•m).

note.para: Seat belt attachment will allow seat belt to swivel after mounting bolt is fully torqued.

step1.para: With the bunk/storage unit (Item 4) positioned over the mounting studs in the cab floor. Install four hex flanged nuts (Item 5), two each end. Tighten to 14.5 to 17.8 lbf-ft (19.6 to 24 N•m).
Position bunk mattress (Item 3) onto bunk/storage unit (Item 4).
If so equipped, install protective plate (Item 1) over both rear seat mounting studs (Item 2) in cab floor.
Install passenger bucket seat, fixed passenger seat and/or fixed passenger bench seat, refer to SEATS .
